title: Freed From The Cage
content:
The world is full of flowers and beautiful scenary but it doesn't belong to me.
The world is full of love and tenderness but there's no place for me to stay.
You freed me from the cage but put shackles on me with your own hands.
Now in the depth of my mind dwells darkness.
A place where pain and sorrow is all I can tell.
But even in the darkness I find a faint light that keeps me in the fight.

title: A Prayer of Faith
content:
May your heart find peace in the storm.
May your soul find comfort in the arms of grace.
May your life produce results only God can give.
In the valley of trials, may His hand lift you.
May His blessings be your strength, and His love be your song.

title: Echoes of Time
content:
Through the corridors of time I walk,
Leaving footprints in the sands of thought.
The winds of change brush past my soul,
Carrying whispers of memories untold.
Yet in the echoes, I find my place,
A fleeting moment in life's race.

title: Silent Battles
content:
Beneath the smile, the battle rages on,
A war unseen, fought with courage strong.
For every tear shed in the quiet night,
Thereâ€™s a strength reborn in the morning light.
Though the world may never see the scars,
In silent battles, we become who we are.
